member.name: M:PWMInitialize(void)
member.summary: This function initializes the pwm related hardware. It replaces IFI's Generate_Pwms() function.

member.name: M:PWMSetValues(BYTE,BYTE,BYTE,BYTE)
member.summary: This function sets the pwm values for channel 13-16.
member.param: Specifies the position/velocity value for PWM channel 13.
Specifies the position/velocity value for PWM channel 14.
Specifies the position/velocity value for PWM channel 15.
Specifies the position/velocity value for PWM channel 16.

member.name: M:PWMPrintData(void)
member.summary: This function prints the state of the PWMs.
